=== Current Issues ===
* X.org fails to start (http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=17421)
* Upgrading from Hoary: ACPI or Kernel bug makes the batteries not detected (http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=11798) and temperatures not correctly readed. That makes the laptop to shutdown by a Critical Temperature event (something similar to this http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=16372). This doesn't happen on a Breezy clean install.
